channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (11 Dec 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-12-11/#comment-260">Susanta</a>.
My pleasure, Susanta! I'm a big fan of what Sridhar is doing and it was great of him to take the time to do the interview.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susanta.

My pleasure, Susanta! I’m a big fan of what Sridhar is doing and it was great of him to take the time to do the interview.

item.title: By: Susanta
item.dc:creator: Susanta
item.description:
Thanks for yet another great weekly round-up, Nick!
Quite clearly, Sridhar's interview takes the cake! How inspiring!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for yet another great weekly round-up, Nick!

Quite clearly, Sridhar’s interview takes the cake! How inspiring!

item.title: By: Andrea_R
item.dc:creator: Andrea_R
item.description: The meetup was great, and we met a TON of people. :) As soon as my talk is up, I'll tweet it out.
